content: unicorn pikachu notes ● do not join with a slip_stitch work in a continuous round ● number inside at the end of a line is the number of stitches at the end of the round ● you can use a stitch marker to mark the beginning of a round ● us crochet terminology used abbreviations materials ● single_crochet = simple crochet ● 3 0 mm crochet hook ● double_crochet = double_crochet ● yellow yarn ● increase = increase ● red yarn ● decrease = decrease ● choose the colors you want ● chain = chain ● 2 safety eyes ● magic_ring = magic_ring ● toy stu�ng ● sl = slip_stitch pikachu s head 1 in yellow
